original_title: The Flood: The Big Picture of Its Mechanism and Resulting Evidences
overview: Geologist Dr. Andrew Snelling presents several lines of evidence that both confirm the biblical account of the global Flood, and cannot be explained by evolutionary models. From deep sea fossils high atop the Himalayas to the movement of the continents during the Flood, the big picture comes into sharp focus when you look through the lens of the Bible!
title: The Flood: The Big Picture of Its Mechanism and Resulting Evidences
